sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.getEditorUsers</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>getEditorUsers</name>
        <script><![CDATA[function getEditorUsers(){
	var users = {};
	var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_user_has_role');
	gr.addEncodedQuery('roleINd2b8c44a5f2111001c9b2572f2b47748');
	gr.query();
	while (gr.next()) {
		users[gr.user.toString()] = true;
	}
	var ids = [];
	for (var id in users)
		ids.push(id);
	return ids.join(',');
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2016-01-18 19:53:01</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>5ada1f9d9301120042cf530b547ffb8b</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>getEditorUsers</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Service Catalog Platform" source="com.glideapp.servicecatalog.platform">6d218d0f6d2620100acb70b35343303c</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_5ada1f9d9301120042cf530b547ffb8b</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2016-01-18 19:53:01</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>306</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
